mapper.sql: id, username, password, sex, phone, trueName, idCard, address, orgId, state, type, hireDate, imgIdcard1, imgIdcard2, createTime, updateTime
mapper.select: select a.*,m.menuName from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on ur.userId=u.id left join sys_role r on r.id=ur.roleId left join sys_role_authorities ra on ra.roleId=r.id left join sys_authorities a on ra.authorityId=a.id left join sys_menu m on m.id=a.menuId where u.id=#{userId}
SELECT m.* FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.roleId = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON m.id=rm.menuId WHERE r.id= #{roleId} GROUP BY m.id

SELECT m.id,m.parentId,m.menuName,m.menuUrl,m.menuIcon,m.sort FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = ur.roleId LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.roleId = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON m.id=rm.menuId LEFT JOIN sys_menu n ON n.parentId=m.id WHERE u.id= #{userId} GROUP BY m.id
select r.* from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on ur.userId=u.id left join sys_role r on r.id=ur.roleId where u.id=#{userId}

select u.* from sys_user u
and u.trueName like "%" #{name} "%"

SELECT u.* , o.`name` AS "orgName" FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_org o ON o.id=u.orgId LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId WHERE u.username=#{username} AND u.`password`=#{password} AND u.state = '0' AND ur.roleId IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_role WHERE roleName != '业务员' AND isDel = '0' )

SELECT u.* , o.`name` AS "orgName", r.roleName AS "role" FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_org o ON o.id=u.orgId LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId WHERE u.id=#{userId} AND u.state = '0' AND ur.roleId IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_role WHERE roleName != '业务员' AND isDel = '0' )

SELECT u.*,r.id AS "roleId", r.roleName AS "role",o.`name` AS "orgName" FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId LEFT JOIN sys_org o ON o.id = u.orgId WHERE ur.roleId IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_role WHERE roleName != '业务员' )

SELECT u.*,r.id AS "roleId", r.roleName AS "role",o.`name` AS "orgName" FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId LEFT JOIN sys_org o ON o.id = u.orgId WHERE ISNULL(u.orgId) AND ur.roleId IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_role WHERE roleName = '网点负责人' );
